snippet: Friday’s selections from around the Web include the story of a hacker who found out that his E-ZPass transmitter, which he uses to electronically pay tolls, was being tracked outside of tollbooths. Plus, a tale of Zynga’s rise and fall.
abstract: Friday’s selections from around the Web include the story of a hacker who found out that his E-ZPass transmitter, which he uses to electronically pay tolls, was being tracked outside of tollbooths. Plus, a tale of Zynga’s rise and fall.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Tracking Your E-ZPass Toll Transmitter, and Zynga's Tale of Woe
